item.description:
Join me for dinner and more.

Max & Dylan's is famous for their mac & cheese (although they have plenty of other dining options). Check out the menu and you'll see what I mean. :)

After dinner, let's take a walk through Boston Commons to view the trees which will be all lit up in their holiday best.

Cheers ~
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations are under "Heather" and we will be seated upstairs.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Max & Dylans and snazzy trees
